database.name: VIEW RCHR_EMP_RELAYINFO
database.view: SELECT j.rchr_relayshift_details_id AS rchr_emp_relayinfo_id, j.ad_org_id, j.ad_client_id, j.isactive, j.created, j.createdby, j.updated, j.updatedby, j.rchr_employee_id, j.rchr_mrelay_id, j.rchr_shiftgroup_id, j.effectivedate FROM rchr_relayshift_details j
